Languages.Language 1: Any it knew in life! (what do I do with that for this lmfao)

Equipment Actions.Action 1: Withering Touch, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 17 Necrotic

Other Actions.Action 1: Etherealness, The Ghost enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa
Other Actions.Action 2: Horrifying Visage, The Ghost reveals its cursed visage, attempting to frighten creatures that see it.  It has been said that this skill can also cause creatures to age rapidly
Other Actions.Action 3: Possession, The Ghost possesses a living humanoid.  It is said a possessed person retains awareness but is unable to exert any control over their body

Abilities.Ability 1: Ethereal Sight, The Ghost can see into the Ethereal plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa
Abilities.Ability 2: Incorporeal Movement, The Ghost can move through other creates and objects

Damage Resistances.Damage 5: Bludgeoning, Piercing, Slashing from nonmagical attacks
